move.doc_string: Moves the selection caret(s) by the specified unit.

args.name: forward
args.doc_string: Whether to move in the forward direction.

args.name: extend
args.doc_string: Whether to extend the selection as the caret(s) move.

move_to.doc_string: Moves the selection caret(s) to the specified relative location.

args.name: to
args.doc_string: The relative location. Valid values are 'eol', 'bol', 'eof', 'bof', 'brackets'.

args.name: extend
args.doc_string: Whether to extend the selection while moving to the specified relative location.

move_to_group.doc_string: Moves the active tab to the specified layout group.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the group, to where the active tab has to be moved.

move_to_neighboring_group.doc_string: Moves the active tab to the neighboring group.

args.name: forward
args.doc_string: Whether to move the tab in the forward direction.
